task.title: Insert videos from YouTube and set automatic playback
task.shortdesc: In this section, you will learn how to add videos from YouTube and set an automatic playback.

taskbody.prereq:
You must have
Windows 7 or newer
Microsoft PowerPoint 2007 or newer
A PowerPoint presentation
Internet connection
A web browser
Steps:

step.cmd: Open your browser and navigate on YouTube to the video, that you want to add.
Copy the video's URL from the Address bar.
Open PowerPoint and select the slide, on which you want to place the video.
Navigate to Multimedia and select Video.
In the Online Video dialog box paste the URL you copied in step 2.
Navigate to Video tools and select Playback.
Next to Start, click the down arrow, and select Automatically.

result.p: You have inserted a video from YouTube, which plays automatically when you open the slide in Slideshow view.
